spec.function_description: Execute an external .bat file to start Creo, then attempts to connect to Creo.
notes: The .bat file is restricted to a specific name to make the function more secure.
Set retries to 0 to NOT attempt to connect to Creo.
The server will pause for 3 seconds before attempting a connection, and will pause for 10 seconds between connection retries
If Creo pops up a message after startup, this function may cause Creo to crash unless retries is set to 0.

request.name: retries
request.description: Number of retries to make when connecting
